titleStmt.title: The shammer shamm'd, in a plain discovery under young Tong's own hand, of a designe to trepann L'Estrange into a pretended subornation against the Popish plot by Roger L'Estrange.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
